io.micronaut.http.hateoas

Class AbstractResource<Impl extends AbstractResource>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.http.hateoas.AbstractResource<Impl>
  • Type Parameters:
    Impl - An Abstract resource implementation
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Resource
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JsonError

    @Produces(value="application/hal+json")
 @Introspected
public abstract class AbstractResource<Impl extends AbstractResource>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Resource
    An abstract implementation of Resource.
    Since:
    1.1
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher
